heading: HR00204
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE SCIENTIFIC VALIDITY OF THE FINDINGS THAT ALKALINE WATER IS THE SECRET TO LONGEVITY AND, IN THE EVENT THAT THE SCIENTIFIC FACTS ARE THUS ESTABLISHED, RECOMMEND PRACTICAL WAYS BY WHICH TO MAKE ALKALINE WATER WIDELY AVAILABLE
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2016-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00204
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE SCIENTIFIC VALIDITY OF THE FINDINGS THAT ALKALINE WATER IS THE SECRET TO LONGEVITY AND, IN THE EVENT THAT THE SCIENTIFIC FACTS ARE THUS ESTABLISHED, RECOMMEND PRACTICAL WAYS BY WHICH TO MAKE ALKALINE WATER WIDELY AVAILABLE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-08-10
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-17;
